posts.title: The SL lineup will likely continue to offer a range of powertrains, including:
posts.content:
SL 43: A 2.0-liter turbocharged inline-4 with mild hybrid technology.

SL 55: A 3.0-liter inline-6 turbocharged engine with hybrid assistance.

SL 63: A high-performance 4.0-liter V8 biturbo engine with hybrid tech.

SL 73e: A plug-in hybrid variant with a V8 engine and electric motor, delivering over 800 horsepower.
